snippet: GARRETT--Elizabeth. Forest City Ratner Companies mourns the loss of Elizabeth Garrett, President of Cornell University. Elizabeth was a remarkable leader whose great thirst for knowledge was matched by her commitment to public service. Our hearts go out to her family and we join them and Cornell University in mourning her loss. Bruce Ratner, MaryAnne Gilmartin, Forest City Ratner Companies 1/3
lead_paragraph: GARRETT--Elizabeth. Forest City Ratner Companies mourns the loss of Elizabeth Garrett, President of Cornell University. Elizabeth was a remarkable leader whose great thirst for knowledge was matched by her commitment to public service. Our hearts go out to her family and we join them and Cornell University in mourning her loss. Bruce Ratner, MaryAnne Gilmartin, Forest City Ratner Companies 1/3
